channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 内戦や紛争で国外に逃れたエチオピアのジャーナリストへのインタビュー。
item.description:
Committee to Protect Journalists:
Interviews with Ethiopian journalists who fled the country due to civil war and conflict and who remain in exile, sometimes struggling to afford food and rent  —  When Belete Kassa's friend and news show co-host Belaye Manaye was arrested in November 2023 and taken to the remote Awash Arba military camp known …

item.title: Talking Points Memoの成り立ち、長年の収益モデル、政治ジャーナリズムの経済構造に起因する「両サイド」フレーミングの理由（Rick Perlstein/American Prospect）
item.description:
Rick Perlstein / American Prospect:
A look at Talking Points Memo's origins, its revenue models over the years, and why “both-sides” framing is due to political journalism's economic structure  —  The book I'm working on now is about how the last 25 years of American politics brought our democratic republic to the brink of collapse.

item.title: ネットフリックス、東南アジアで現地制作を強化、米ライバルの撤退で新規加入者獲得へ、2023年の売上に占めるアジア太平洋地域の割合はわずか11％（Sohee Kim/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Sohee Kim / Bloomberg:
Netflix ramps up local production in Southeast Asia to attract new subscribers as US rivals pull back; Asia Pacific accounted for just ~11% of its 2023 revenue  —  - Streaming giant is backing big-budget shows in Indonesia  — Thai production rises to 10 titles this year, from six in 2023

item.title: WBEZとシカゴ・サンタイムズの組合員記者たちが、4月のレイオフ後、シカゴ・パブリック・メディアのマット・ムーグCEOの即時解任を求める圧倒的な票を投じた。
item.description:
WBEZ:
Unionized journalists at WBEZ and the Chicago Sun-Times voted overwhelmingly for Chicago Public Media CEO Matt Moog's immediate removal, after layoffs in April  —  Unions for the Chicago Sun-Times and WBEZ criticized Matt Moog, who announced he planned to leave last year but later oversaw layoffs.

item.title: カンヌでXのリンダ・ヤカリノCEOは、NWSLのシリーズ「The Offseason」のようなドキュメンタリーの制作について、スポーツリーグと話し合っていると語った（Kerry Flynn/Axios）
item.description:
Kerry Flynn / Axios:
At Cannes, X CEO Linda Yaccarino says the platform is in conversations with sports leagues about producing more docuseries, like the NWSL series The Offseason  —  - About 70% of the conversation ahead of the Paris Olympics this summer is about women's teams, she added.

item.title: MoffettNathanson：2024年第1四半期は有料テレビ事業史上最悪の四半期となり、加入者数は6.9％減の237万人を失い、YouTube TVでさえわずかに縮小した（Peter Kafka/Business Insider）
item.description:
Peter Kafka / Business Insider:
MoffettNathanson: Q1 2024 was the worst quarter the pay-TV business has ever seen, losing 2.37M subscribers, down 6.9%, and even YouTube TV slightly shrank  —  - Pay TV just suffered its worst quarter in history — a stunning 6.9% drop.  — The TV industry used to hope digital services …

item.title: スナップ、従業員の差別・報復・セクハラ疑惑を3年間調査した結果、カリフォルニア州と1500万ドルの和解に合意（Lara Korte/Politico）
item.description:
Lara Korte / Politico:
Snap agrees to a $15M settlement with California after a three-year probe into employees' allegations of discrimination, retaliation, and sexual harassment  —  Women who worked for the company in the last decade may be eligible for compensation.  —  SACRAMENTO, California …

item.title: ロンドンのスポーツコンテンツスタジオC15 Studioがステルス状態から脱し、F1やTriton Pokerなどと提携してFASTチャンネルを開設（Matthew Keys/The Desk）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
London-based sports content studio C15 Studio emerges from stealth to launch FAST channels in partnership with Formula 1, Triton Poker, and others  —  The developer of free, ad-supported streaming television (FAST) channels dedicated to programming from Formula 1, Triton Poker and professional squash …

item.title: 情報筋WaPoのウィル・ルイスがボリス・ジョンソンらに、2021年12月と2022年1月に英国のCOVID時代のパーティーゲート・スキャンダルの際に携帯電話を「クリーンアップ」するよう助言（The Guardian紙）
item.description:
The Guardian:
Sources: WaPo's Will Lewis advised Boris Johnson and others to “clean up” their phones during UK's COVID-era Partygate scandal in December 2021 and January 2022  —  Sources' claim suggests advice by Will Lewis, an informal adviser to then prime minister, contradicted instructions to staff

item.title: ティンバランドとスウィズ・ビーツは、2021年にトリラーに売却したが、その後再取得した音楽シリーズ「Verzuz」の配給契約をXと結ぶ（Jem Aswad/Variety）
item.description:
Jem Aswad / Variety:
Timbaland and Swizz Beatz strike a distribution deal with X for their music series Verzuz, which they sold to Triller in 2021 but have since reacquired  —  Earlier in the year, Swizz and Timbaland reacquired Verzuz from their previous partner Triller and now own 100% of the platform …

item.title: 分析：Perplexityは、robots.txtを無視した密かな方法でサイトをスクレイピングしているようで、Perplexityと結びついたマシンがWiredや他のサイトでそれを行なっている（Wired）。
item.description:
Wired:
Analysis: Perplexity seems to scrape sites using surreptitious methods, ignoring robots.txt, with a Perplexity-tied machine doing so on Wired and other sites  —  A WIRED investigation shows that the AI-powered search startup Forbes has accused of stealing its content is surreptitiously scraping—and making things up out of thin air.

item.title: イーロン・マスクは、ツイッターが2023年のイベントを欠席した後、カンヌライオンズへの出席を通じて、しばしばぎくしゃくする広告業界との関係を修復しようとした（ブルームバーグ）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Elon Musk tried to repair his often strained relationship with the ad industry through an appearance at the Cannes Lions, after Twitter skipped 2023's event  —  Elon Musk attempted to repair his often strained relationship with the advertising industry with an appearance at the Cannes Lions conference in France on Wednesday.

item.title: Skydanceとの合併交渉に失敗したParamountと、交渉中止というShari Redstoneの一方的な決断が示す異常な権力 (Variety)
item.description:
Variety:
A look at Paramount's failed merger talks with Skydance and how Shari Redstone's unilateral decision to call off the talks shows her unusual power  —  For Shari Redstone, it was nothing personal.  But the longer the negotiations went on, the more Redstone fell out of love with the idea …

item.title: X社、ジャーナリストのパブロ・マンリケス氏によるテッド・クルーズ上院議員の寄付者情報に関するバイラル投稿の一部を削除。
item.description:
Charlie Nash / Mediaite:
X removes some of journalist Pablo Manriquez's viral posts on Senator Ted Cruz's donor info; X claims the posts violated its rules but did not give details  —  A series of viral social media posts revealing the contents of a folder on Sen. Ted Cruz's (R-TX) donors were removed by Elon Musk's platform X on Tuesday.

item.title: テレグラフ・メディア・グループ、営業利益は前年比35.2％増の5,420万ポンドとなったものの、未確認の負債2億7,760万ポンドにより2023年に2億4,460万ポンドの損失を計上（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Telegraph Media Group reports a record £244.6M loss in 2023 due to £277.6M of previously unidentified debt, despite operating profit rising 35.2% YoY to £54.2M  —  Telegraph Media Group has reported a record £244.6m loss in 2023, despite a 35% rise in operating profit.
